title: Delicious Crockpot Pulled Pork Recipe
directions: Put pork in the crockpot and cover with stock.
Toss in the spices and sweetener (if using) and cover.
Turn the crockpot on low and cook for eight to 10 hours.
Use two forks to shred the meat to your liking.
ingredients: 1/2 cup of beef or chicken stock
1/2 teaspoon each of black pepper and paprika
1/4 to 1/2 cup honey or maple syrup if you like a sweet/tangy sauce (or use a sweetener of your choice)
